creator: goyourfly
descriptionHtml:
Assistive Touch Plus is a Floating Window shortcut application similar to Assistive Touch, which provides:
• App shortcut: add your favorite app and open it quickly on floating window (eg. Add YouTube, Facebook, Twitter as a shortcut to fast open)
• Quick Record: Quickly record your tasks on the floating window, you can set the time, and it will remind you when the time comes
• Countdown day: Add important days through the floating window, such as birthday, Christmas, etc. it will show how many days left until this day
• Drinking water: Remind you to drink water, at the same time you can also record the drinking time of drinking water
• Steps record: Count your steps in each time period, daily steps
• App usage statistics: Show how you use your phone every day, how long, and how long each app is used.

Assistive Touch Plus is very powerful, you only need to swipe up and down, left and right to switch to different panels, you can use it in anywhere through the floating window.

Accessibility service:
This application has applied for Accessibility service permissions. You need to grant this permission so that the app can perform the HOME/BACK/RECENT button click.
descriptionShort: Just Try Me! The BEST Floating Window Assistive Touch app you are looking for
title: Assistive Touch Plus - Float Window App Shortcuts
